title: Shocking moment brawl breaks out between two women in beauty shop
text:
Footage has emerged of two women having a fight in an Aberdeen beauty salon.

The clip, which was taken in Ai to Ai at the indoor market in the Scottish city, shows the pair scrapping as a third woman tries to break them up.

The pair have since been banned from the market following the altercation on Saturday afternoon.

The video was posted to Snapchat and Twitter with the caption: 'Why I never enter Aberdeen Market.'

In the footage, a woman in a black jacket is seen standing at the door of the salon having a heated argument with a woman wearing a pink jacket.

The woman in black raises her hand causing the other to lash out.

The pair then grapple with each other, but are kept apart by a woman wearing a white jacketm, who seems to be acting as a peacmaker.

They eventually stop fighting as the video zooms out and ends.

A source at the market said he was called to the incident and the pair have since been banned.

He said: 'As I am a bouncer as well it was right up my street.

'By the time I got there it had stopped. The girl with the blonde hair I recognised and dealt with before. The other one I hadn't.

'I have no idea what it was about. You never do. It's the same in the bouncer world, you're just there to break it up.

'They have been banned.'

The woman in black gesticulates at the woman in pink as the woman in white stands between

Things turn heated between the pair with arms raised and fists and hands flying in the clip

Ai to Ai salon owner Uzma Naz told The Daily Record she fears for her business.

She said: 'One customer was in getting her eyebrows done and was about to finish when another lady with her mum and a child in a buggy came in.

'She was just about to leave when they just started fighting - I have no idea why.

'It looked as though they knew each and had some kind of issue. The security guards at the market were called and they were chucked out.

'The fight had nothing to do with our salon.

'We're a small business struggling to get by and things like this just give us such a bad name.

'The incident was very loud and a lot of people who noticed it came in to our store, including other shops, asking us about it as if it's our fault.

'We work really hard to bring customers to our store and it hurts us. We don't want people seeing the viral video and thinking it happened because we had done something.'
description: The brawl was filmed in Ai to Ai, a beauty salon in Aberdeen market in Scotland. Two women, one in black and one in pink, start arguing then fighting in the salon.
